Hello collectors,

I have an 1887 Gypsy Queen of John Coleman for sale. The image quality is fantastic. I'm fairly certain the card has been skinned. A great type card for your collection at an affordable price. I'm looking to get $200 for this beauty.

E-mail: [url]rare_baseballstuff@yahoo.com[/url]


[IMG]http://s107.photobucket.com/albums/m294/madjams/ColemanGypsyQueen.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://s107.photobucket.com/albums/m294/madjams/Colemanback.jpg[/IMG]
Bump for price reduction. Looking for $200 for this beauty.
